thread.section_title: Real-Time News: Latest Northeast Ohio News - cleveland.com
thread.title: Cleveland Councilman Jeff Johnson first to file petitions to be a candidate for mayor of Cleveland
thread.title_full: Cleveland Councilman Jeff Johnson first to file petitions to be a candidate for mayor of Cleveland

author: Robert Higgs, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland Councilman Jeff Johnson first to file petitions to be a candidate for mayor of Cleveland
text: Cleveland City Councilman Jeff Johnson is the first to file nominating petitions in this year's mayoral race, but incumbent Frank Jackson and former East Cleveland Mayor Eric Brewer have declared they are running.
